key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions
Competitive pressure from constant innovation by rivals
Integration risks post-merger with II-VI Incorporated
Regulatory and trade risks from global operations
Legal and ethical concerns, including employment discrimination and labor practices
controversies: Employment discrimination case filed in September 2023
Concerns about labor practices despite claims of compliance with local child labor laws
social_issues: Concerns about labor practices and employment discrimination
